thread.title: Ex-Staffer Says Gowdy Broke Federal Law
thread.title_full: Ex-Staffer Says Gowdy Broke Federal Law

author: Taegan Goddard
title: Ex-Staffer Says Gowdy Broke Federal Law
text:
Ex-Staffer Says Gowdy Broke Federal Law October 12, 2015 
“The legal battle between the House Benghazi Committee and its former investigator, Todd Podliska, escalated Monday afternoon, when Podliska’s lawyers alleged that Chairman Trey Gowdy violated government confidentiality rules and federal law,” MSNBC reports.
